parameters: \AA[FFFF]\FFFF[1020Eriza_0009]\N<Eliza>Well done for coming!! Now, choose your destination!!
if(s[49])ブラックブリザード団本拠地

\AA[FFFFF]\FFFFF[1020Eriza_0000]\N<Eliza>【BB Gang Headquarters】Danger Level: ??? It's finally the
final battle!! Make sure you're fully prepared and in top
condition to take on and blow away the great evil!!

\AA[FFFFF]\FFFFF[1020Eriza_0000]\N<Eliza>【Inlet Cave】Danger Level: 4 We've received communication
from the enemy that Pure Dark is waiting here. It's going to
be a battle with an enemy executive. Brace yourself and go
for it!!

\AA[FFFFF]\FFFFF[1020Eriza_0008]\N<Eliza>【Inlet Cave】Danger Level: 4 It seems like Pure Dark has been
successfully repelled! The monsters here have also become
quiet, according to reports. They might disappear
eventually♪

\AA[FFFFF]\FFFFF[1020Eriza_0000]\N<Eliza>【Mountain Path】Danger Level: 5 We've got word that Black
Cute is waiting in this area!! There are likely monsters
along the way lying in wait for you. However, there's no
running away. Please go and give them a good thrashing!!

\AA[FFFFF]\FFFFF[1020Eriza_0008]\N<Eliza>【Mountain Path】Danger Level: 5 It seems like Black Cute has
been taught a lesson♪ The ferocious animals have also become
somewhat calmer. This district should be safe for now♪

\AA[FFFFF]\FFFFF[1020Eriza_0000]\N<Eliza>【A Certain Urban Area】Danger Level: 6 A challenge from Dark
Soldier!! He says he's brainwashed the people of this town,
and if you want them returned to normal, you must duel him!!
Win at all costs and free the people of the town!!

\AA[FFFFF]\FFFFF[1020Eriza_0008]\N<Eliza>【A Certain Urban Area】Danger Level: 6 Dark Soldier has
vanished, and the brainwashing device has been destroyed,
peace seems to have been restored... Eh? There are still
people who are brainwashed? Hahahaha, that can't be
possible!! (laughs)

\AA[FFFFF]\FFFFF[1020Eriza_0000]\N<Eliza>【Abandoned Mine】Danger Level: 1 Recently, there have been
numerous sightings of BB Gang combatants "The Cores" in the
abandoned mine. They might be plotting something. Please go
and check it out!!

\AA[FFFFF]\FFFFF[1020Eriza_0008]\N<Eliza>【Abandoned Mine】Danger Level: 1 The place where The Cores
gathered has been pursued. This place is already resolved♪

\AA[FFFFF]\FFFFF[1020Eriza_0000]\N<Eliza>【Forest】Danger Level: 2 There have been reports of "Goblins"
controlled by the BB Gang appearing. There are also reports
of missing local residents, they might be plotting
something. Please go and scatter those goblins!!

\AA[FFFFF]\FFFFF[1020Eriza_0008]\N<Eliza>【Forest】Danger Level: 2 The goblins were plotting some evil
deeds. But, it's already resolved♪

\AA[FFFFF]\FFFFF[1020Eriza_0000]\N<Eliza>【Waterway】Danger Level: 3 It seems like monsters released by
the BB Gang have infiltrated the waterway. They must be
plotting something!! Before they cause any trouble, please
go and crush them!!

\AA[FFFFF]\FFFFF[1020Eriza_0008]\N<Eliza>【Waterway】Danger Level: 3 Planning to mix poison into the
drinking water, what a terrible plot... but, this place is
also resolved now♪
